// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 gEffectUVOffset;
//   row_major float4x4 gEffectWorldViewProj;
//   bool gEnableMultiUV;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   gEnableMultiUV       b0       1
//   gEffectWorldViewProj c200     4
//   gEffectUVOffset      c209     1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, -0.5, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0, c201, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c200, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c202, r0
    add r0, r0, c203

mov o0, r0 // Relocated from line 38 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --only-autofixed --auto-fix-vertex-halo D5747C23.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x

    mul r1.xyz, r0.xyww, c0.xyxw
    add o2.xy, r1.z, r1
    if b0
      add o1, c209, v1
    else
      add o1, c209.xyxy, v1.xyxy
    endif

//     mov o0, r0 // Relocated to line 31 with shadertool.py
    mov o2.zw, r0

// approximately 15 instruction slots used
